title: BoilerOptimizer
description: A full - stack web application that uses a custom built MIP solver to optimize a schedule

title: Machine Learning Image Classifier
description: Deep learning model for image classification using convolutional neural networks. Achieves 95% accuracy on test datasets with real-time inference capabilities.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Interactive weather dashboard with real-time data visualization, 7-day forecasts, and location-based weather alerts. Features responsive design and offline support.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team chat, and project tracking. Supports kanban boards and Gantt charts.

title: Data Visualization Tool
description: Advanced data visualization toolkit for creating interactive charts and dashboards. Supports multiple chart types and real-time data streaming.

title: Portfolio Generator
description: Automated portfolio website generator with customizable themes and templates. Integrates with GitHub to showcase projects and contributions.
